entity.name: The First Men
entity.entry: Before the present empire another race of men lived an prospered before the curse of the gods well upon them. They are extinct now.

posts.name: Mycenae - Whispers of a Hidden City
posts.entry:
Legend has it that [location:7470807] was founded by Heracles, son of Zeus after his great labors. The city was said to have flourished in the first age, but fell into obscurity as the new Empire arose. To this day, archeologist have not locate the city and many believe the present empire is built on the bones and foundation of the first empire.

But, rumors stir from time to time of a hidden city to the north, where the blood of Heracles runs true.
